alert.note: Alert for Dubois (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:07PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Dubois and northwestern Orange Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 407 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bedford to near Shoals to 7 miles north of Jasper. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Orange and northern Dubois Counties, including the following locations... Hillham, Orangeville, Bonds, Dubois Crossroads, Norton, French Lick, Kellerville, Haysville, Thales and Cuzco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
